game_common.save_points_warning: Return to the main menu to save your score.
game_common.wrong_try_again: Wrong answer. Try again. Potential points:
game_common.options_hint: You can switch to 'Typing Mode' in the settings if you prefer.
game_common.not_found: Country not found, please select from the list.
game_common.score_system_generic: Scoring System: Your score starts at 50 each round; 10 points are deducted for every wrong guess.

game_capital.title: Capital Hunt
game_capital.description: Identify the country by its capital.
game_capital.content: Capital of the country to guess:
game_capital.input_hint: Which country is this the capital of?
game_capital.rule_welcome: A capital city name will be shown. Find which country this capital belongs to.
game_capital.rule_how_to_play: Select from the options or type the country name in keyboard mode. Keep guessing until you find the correct answer.
game_capital.rule_tip: Tip: Learning European and Asian capitals is a great starting point!

game_flag.title: Flag Hunt
game_flag.description: Identify the country by its flag.
game_flag.rule_welcome: A country flag will be shown. Find which country this flag belongs to.
game_flag.rule_how_to_play: Select from the options or type the country name in keyboard mode. Keep guessing until you find the correct answer.
game_flag.rule_tip: Tip: Watch out for similar flags! (e.g., Romania-Chad, Monaco-Indonesia)

game_distance.title: Distance Hunt
game_distance.description: Guess the country based on distance and direction.
game_distance.rule_welcome: A Wordle-like geography game! Make guesses to find the hidden country.
game_distance.rule_how_to_play: After each guess, you'll see the distance and direction to the target country. Use these hints to find the correct answer.
game_distance.rule_score: Score: Starts at 300, -10 per wrong guess. Minimum 100 points after 15+ guesses.
game_distance.rule_tip: Tip: Distances are calculated from geographic centers, ¬±100 km deviation possible.

game_borderline.title: Borderline
game_borderline.description: Identify the country by its shape.
game_borderline.hint_scale: Country sizes are scaled to fit the screen, not actual proportions.
game_borderline.rule_welcome: A country's border shape will be shown. Find which country this shape belongs to.
game_borderline.rule_how_to_play: Select from the options or type the country name in keyboard mode. Keep guessing until you find the correct answer.
game_borderline.rule_tip: Tip: Look for distinctive shapes! (Italy-boot, Japan-arc shape, etc.)

game_borderpath.title: Border Path
game_borderpath.description: Reach the target by following border neighbors.
game_borderpath.rule_1: Travel from the starting country to the target by following border neighbors.
game_borderpath.rule_2: You can only move to countries that share a land border.
game_borderpath.rule_3: Score: Starts at 100, -10 for each extra move beyond optimal. Minimum 20 points.
game_borderpath.rule_4: Track your path on the map. Use the undo button if you go the wrong way.
game_borderpath.no_neighbors_left: No neighboring countries left to move to!
